name: Apple
description: Crunchy and sweet; keeps the doctor unemployed.

description: It used to moo, now it sizzles.

description: 'My cabbages!' a famous cabbage vendor lamented...

description: Italian mafia's favorite tool to launder money and ... make body disappear.

description: Sends vibration so powerful, it could massage your brian.

description: If you send your girl flour, you'll probably never see her again.

description: Do vampires hate garlic or the odor resulted from its excessive consumption?

description: Does it count as Cannibalism if it's drank by Jews?

description: half the world loves it, while the other half hates it.

description: AI understood it as a room with mush in it.
